name: Shak'l, Servant of Apophis
effect: Each time you would take a card from the top of your deck to revive a Goa’uld adversary, you may discard a card instead.

name: Shock Grenade
effect: Failure: Stop all characters.

name: Sokar, Rising Nemesis
effect: Failure: Your opponent chooses a glyph from an assigned character and puts it on the bottom of his mission pile.

name: Special Training
effect: Choose a team character to get SCI +1 until the end of the current mission. If he’s an NID character, he gets SCI +2 until the end of the current mission instead.

name: Staff Weapon
effect: Stop this gear, pay 3 power – Stop a ready adversary.

name: Stall Enemy, Cimmeria
effect: To assign an adversary, your opponent pays 1 power for each assigned character.

name: Stonewalled
effect: This obstacle costs power -1 to play while a Political adversary is assigned. When you play this obstacle, stop a character.

name: Supply Raid, Nirrti's Supply Depot
effect: Success: Your opponent loses 2 power.

name: Suppression Fire
effect: To play this event, stop a character. Draw a number of cards equal to that character’s COM.

name: Survey Goa'uld Pleasure Palace, P4X-347
effect: This mission gets difficulty +1 while there is at least one complication.

name: Svetlana Markov, Brilliant Scientist
effect: [O]: Svetlana Markov gets CUL +1, [L]: Svetlana Markov gets SCI +1, [T]: Svetlana Markov gets ING +1

name: Symbiote Poison
effect: Destroy this gear, pay 3 power – Destroy an assigned Goa’uld or Jaffa adversary, or a Goa’uld or Jaffa obstacle at the current mission.

name: System Overload
effect: Failure: Destroy a gear.

name: T.E.R.
effect: Stop this gear, pay 2 power – Reveal a random card from your opponent’s hand. If it’s a villain card, that opponent discards it.

name: Tabloid Research
effect: To play this event, stop a character. Look at a number of cards from the top of your mission pile equal to that character’s CUL. Place those cards in any order on the top and/or bottom of that pile.

name: Tanith, Lurker
effect: Complications cost you power -1 to play.

name: Teal'c, Enemy of the Goa'uld
effect: [O]: Complications cost power +1 to play while Teal’c is assigned. [P]: Complications cost power +1 to play while Teal’c is assigned.

name: Teal'c, Staunch Defender
effect: [S], Stop and incapacitate Teal’c – Ready all other SGC team and Jaffa team characters.

name: Teal'c, Warrior of Chulak
effect: Each time Teal’c earns a glyph, your opponent loses 1 power for each different glyph Teal’c has.

name: Team Compromised
effect: When you play this obstacle, your opponent chooses a ready team character. He is blocked.

name: Telekinetic Mutants
effect: When you play this obstacle, your opponent stops a character.

name: The Enemy Within
effect: Failure: Place this obstacle on a support character and stop him. He becomes an adversary under your control, with no game text, the Goa’uld trait, and a revie cost equal to his cost. He can’t be scored.

name: Thor, Asgard Ally
effect: Each time Thor earns a different glyph, you may pay 3 power. If you do, ready each other character who has a glyph matching it.

name: Thor, Friend of the Tau'ri
effect: When you play Thor, you may search your mission pile for a mission. If you do, shuffle the rest of the pile, then place that mission on top of it.

name: Tight Rein
effect: To assign a character, your opponent stops another character.

name: Tight-knit Team
effect: Move a glyph from one character to another.

name: Time Loop, P4X-639
effect: Failure: You can’t play any more missions this turn.

name: Tolok, Jaffa Elder
effect: When you play Tolok, you may pay 2 power and discard a card. If you do, ready another Jaffa character.

name: Too Close Encounter
effect: Failure: For each other Replicator card at the current mission, stop a character.

name: Top Minds
effect: To play this event, stop two characters. Destroy an obstacle.

name: Touch of Corruption
effect: When you play this obstacle, stop a character, then ready a stopped character.

name: Training Exercises, Converted Warehouse
effect: Each time you assign a character who has no glyph, your opponent gains 1 power.

name: Transport Rings
effect: Stop this gear, pay 3 power – Ready a character.

name: Trofsky, Hathor's Lieutenant
effect: Trofsky gets difficulty +1 for each Jaffa obstacle at the current mission.

name: Troop Landing
effect: Failure: Destroy a stopped support or assigned support character.

name: Uncover the Stargate, Tagrea
effect: To assign a support character, you must pay 2 power.

name: Under Fire
effect: This obstacle costs power -2 to play while a Jaffa adversary is assigned. Failure: Destroy a support character.

name: Under Suspicion
effect: Failure: Place this obstacle on a character. To assign him, your opponent pays 2 power. When your opponent succeeds at a mission, destroy this obstacle.

name: Unlikely Friends
effect: When you play this obstacle, ready an assigned character. He is blocked.

name: Urgo's Influence
effect: Withdraw 2, This obstacle gets difficulty +1 for each assigned character who has a glyph.

name: Vala Mal Doran, Con Artist
effect: Stop Vala Mal Doran, put a [L] or [P] glyph from beneath her on the bottom of your mission pile – Place the top card of your mission pile beneath Vala Mal Doran.

name: Vala Mal Doran, Probationary Member of the SGC
effect: Vala Mal Doran gets skills +1 while assigned to a mission that has a glyph matching one of hers.

name: Vidrine, Lieutenant General
effect: Each time you play a gear, you may ready Vidrine.

name: Walter Harriman, Technician
effect: At the start of your power phase, you may look at the top two cards of your mission pile. If you do, place one of those cards on the top of that pile and one on the bottom.

name: Warrick, Race Pilot
effect: Success: Gain 1 power.

name: Water-Based Life Forms
effect: Failure: Choose One: Stop a team character, or destroy a support character.

name: What Fate Omaroca?, P8X-362
effect: This mission gets difficulty -1 while at least one character who has a [G] glyph is assigned.

name: Whitlow, Covert Contact
effect: Each time your opponent plays a complication, you may draw a card.

name: Wormhole X-Treme!, The Bridge Studios
effect: Obstacles cost power +1 to play.

name: Writings from Heliopolis
effect: Stop this gear, pay 1 power – Destroy a CUL obstacle at the current mission. Your opponent gains power equal to that obstacle’s cost.

name: Yeeeehaaaw!
effect: Destroy an obstacle or an assigned adversary.

name: Yu, The Great
effect: Yu gets difficulty +1 for each successful mission this turn.

name: Zat Gun
effect: Stop this gear, pay power as listed below – Chose a COM obstacle and do one of the following: 1 power – It gets diffculty -1. 2 power – Remove its failure text. 3 power – Destroy it.

name: Zukhov, Russian Colonel
effect: Each time Zukhov earns a [P] glyph, you may search your deck for a card. If you do, reveal it, take it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
